features.name: consumer_id
features.description: Consumer ID built from BBAN proxy (Unique)

features.name: num_trans_last_7d
features.description: Aggregated Metric: Average number of transactions for the consumer aggregated by past 7 days

features.name: avg_amt_last_7d
features.description: Aggregated Metric: Average transaction amount for the consumer aggregated by past 7 days

features.name: num_trans_last_1d
features.description: Aggregated Metric: Average number of transactions for the consumer aggregated by past 1 day

features.name: avg_amt_last_1d
features.description: Aggregated Metric: Average transaction amount for the consumer aggregated by past 1 day

features.name: event_time
features.description: Externally generated event timestamp (String in ISO-8601 format)
